title: Organizer Blames Riders for Wrong-Turn Fiasco at Faun-Ardèche
content:
UPDATED: Romain Grégoire wins the Faun-Ardèche Classic after leaders take the wrong turn in a chaotic repeat of Algarve fiasco last month.
